title: Ranked 3v3 Question
body:
So I've been wondering for the longest time about this, but I simply cannot find any concrete answers from Riot. So the ranked season is giving bonus rewards if you get gold in both Solo/Duo and Flex queue. But what's never directly stated is whether Flex 3v3 will apply to this bonus, or if it's exclusively for Flex 5v5.

People keep assuming it will since the game is still allowing ranked Flex 3v3 to be a thing. I have Gold V in Solo/Duo and Flex 3v3, but Silver III in Flex 5v5. Do I get these mysterious bonus rewards?

replies.body: Well that's a little lame. I won't know until its practically too late.

We haven't had any announcements yet for this season's rewards, so I couldn't really say for sure.  Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page as we draw closer to the end of the season.
